name: STD: Quack!
description:
During a peaceful morning, mother duck was strolling happily with her ducklings when all of a sudden they were kidnapped by swans back to the infamous Swan City. As a good mother you must explore every corner of the city and save your ducklings back before something bad happens to them!

Save The Ducklings: Quack! is a game about mother duck looking for her ducklings which was kidnapped by Swans. Rescue ducklings and unlock various skin for your mother duck!

Note: This game has partial controller support.

Credits Developers
  • Mulia Darma (Supervisor)
  • Williams Sanjaya (Project Manager)
  • Eduardo Brilliandy (Game Designer)
  • Steven Yoshell Yapriadi (Game Programmer)
  • Richard Prayogi (Game Programmer)
  • Vetri Marvel Budiman (Artist)
  • Divaldy Putra Eka (Artist)
  • Hubertus Darrel Santoso (Sound Engineer)
  • Ferry (Guest Artist)
